sources.name: Stage3CaseData
sources.script:
source(output(
		Store_nbr as string,
		StrType as string,
		OpenDate as string,
		gregorian_date as string,
		Cases as string,
		Sales as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false) ~> Stage3CaseData

sinks.name: SaveToDeDupedCSV
sinks.script:
FinalDeDupedRows sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	partitionBy('hash', 1),
	partitionFileNames:['deduped.csv'],
	truncate:true) ~> SaveToDeDupedCSV

sinks.name: SaveDupesCSV
sinks.script:
FinalOnlyDuplicateRows sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false) ~> SaveDupesCSV

transformations.name: GenerateMD5Hash
transformations.script: SurrogateKey1 derive(UniqueKey = md5(concat(Store_nbr, OpenDate, gregorian_date, Cases, Sales))) ~> GenerateMD5Hash

transformations.name: HashCountAggregate
transformations.script:
GenerateMD5Hash aggregate(groupBy(UniqueKey),
	hashcount = sum(1),
		id = max(id)) ~> HashCountAggregate

transformations.name: SurrogateKey1
transformations.script:
Stage3CaseData keyGenerate(output(id as long),
	startAt: 1L) ~> SurrogateKey1

transformations.name: DeDupedRows
transformations.script:
GenerateMD5Hash, HashCountAggregate join(SurrogateKey1@id == HashCountAggregate@id,
	joinType:'inner',
	broadcast: 'none')~> DeDupedRows

transformations.name: FinalDeDupedRows
transformations.script:
DeDupedRows select(mapColumn(
		Store_nbr,
		StrType,
		OpenDate,
		gregorian_date,
		Cases,
		Sales
	))~> FinalDeDupedRows

transformations.name: OnlyDuplicateRows
transformations.script:
GenerateMD5Hash, HashCountGreaterThanOne join(GenerateMD5Hash@UniqueKey == HashCountAggregate@UniqueKey,
	joinType:'inner',
	broadcast: 'none')~> OnlyDuplicateRows

transformations.name: FinalOnlyDuplicateRows
transformations.script:
OnlyDuplicateRows select(mapColumn(
		Store_nbr,
		StrType,
		OpenDate,
		gregorian_date,
		Cases,
		Sales
	))~> FinalOnlyDuplicateRows
